content.text: Welcome to your tailor-made web experience!

content.headline: Static websites
content.text: The website you are currently looking at is generated by our static site generator snack which allows easy creation of websites without technical know-how.

content.headline: Web applications
content.text: Web applications allow us to view, process and edit information directly in the browser. In most cases they follow a client-server model where the frontend requests the data on behalf of the user from one or multiple backend servers.

content.headline: Backend services and APIs
content.text: APIs are the backbone of all modern web applications. Whether you submit a contact form on a website or fetch the latest weather information - APIs are omnipresent in the WWW.
